Articles.Content:
Why have no name when you can have an UNofficial name! - Me.

Kerbals have lost track with which is what and what is which.

You can now name continents/craters/canyons/any special thing on a planet,even name special things on the atmosphere of jool! Or even kerbol! (NO SPECIFIC EASTER EGG AREAS,BUT YOU CAN NAME THE CRATER AFTER THE ANOMALY NEARBY)

Now this is only a diagram of what it will be.

Its in session! Name your heart now!

During this time,I will be adding the reserves on a map.

Kerbin (17 slots available)

Mun (9 slots available No.7 taken)

Minmus (7 slots available)

Now lets make this officially UNofficial!

BLACK = Continent/Piece of land

GREY = Special/Feature

Edited June 3, 2013 by BigBoy734
The devs won't be changing any names.

This is only community based,this wont change anything in-game.

Also any flat maps of planets would be helpful.

Edited May 15, 2013 by BigBoy734
No, its just fine as it is. mabye in cmpaign you can name them, but there wil be no official names.
As I said,NOTHING IN GAME.
People are terrible at reading previous posts

I know right.

Btw,I just found kerbalmaps.com,credit to whoever made that for flat maps!

yes, maybe even better in game, we could name things for our own personal taste, we can already rename ships to our own liking, why not name specific places?, its our own career after all.

If we scan the map it would display a flat panel map to use, and we can divide the areas as we wish and name them. ofcourse not official, its just for own games. I'm having fun naming my ships already, what more if you can name areas!

and as for the community naming, I'm up for it
I've got one or two features on Duna that I want to name, I'll take screenshots of them later since I'm not at my KSP computer.
Also,when naming,give someone a place! Dont just spam,a few for one will be fine,but taking it all,no.
Just to be sure this stays alive.
Just about to add kerbin's two moons in a minute,then duna and ike.
Once 0.20 comes out, we can name the areas after the names made here.
I just added the Mun and Minmus,Next is Duna and Ike.
I still have faith,Dug this up from my started threads,KEEP IT GOING!
I hereby name area #7 on the Mun Silisko Crater.

I hereby name area #15 on Kerbin Thunderbird Lake

P.S. Thunderbird is the name of a mod that has long been abandoned

Edited June 7, 2013 by Agent30632
I name thy continent #3 ''Space Valley''

Ok, I'll toss something at you.

#6 on minmus, I elect to call it the "Higher up highlands of minmus".
#2 on Minmus is now The Hurtif Sea.

Number 9 is the United Islands of Jebbediah!

PS : On kerbin before someone's mad at mah face.
I hear by name number 6 on Kerbin, "Stupid and Redundant"!
11 on Kerban is here now called "Borealis territory"
